title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1739/94 of 15 July 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 3392/93 on detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1842/83 laying down general rules for the supply of milk and certain milk products at reduced prices to schoolchildren
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1739/94 of 15 July 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 3392/93 on detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1842/83 laying down general rules for the supply of milk and certain milk products at  reduced prices to schoolchildren
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 July 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 30, 3. 2. 1994, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 183, 7. 7. 1983, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 249, 7. 10. 1993, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 215, 30. 7. 1992, p. 65.
(6) OJ No L 154, 25. 6. 1993, p. 33.
(7) OJ No L 306, 11. 12. 1993, p. 27.
(8) OJ No L 27, 1. 2. 1994, p. 37.
